long_description: Pick up the affordable Black Diamond FreeWire quickdraw set and head to the crag for some climbing. Quickdraw set features a polished Quicksilver wiregate carabiner on top and an anodized orange Quicksilver wiregate carabiner on the bottom. Quickdraw is equipped with an 18mm-wide nylon dogbone runner. Rubber Straitjacket(TM) insert in runner loop keeps the bottom carabiner in proper orientation for easier and more efficient clipping. Asymmetric D-shape keeps 'biner loads where they belong. The Black Diamond FreeWire Quickdraw set is available in 12cm or 18cm lengths.
short_description: Pick up the affordable Black Diamond FreeWire quickdraw set and head to the crag for some climbing.
